895:7: bhaktebhyo varade devi trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 1 ||
895:12: siddhānāṃ pūjite devi trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 3 ||
895:14: ugratāre namo nityaṃ trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 4 ||
895:21: snāne dāne tathā jāpye balidāne tathā kratau |
895:22: prasthāne ca na śakto'haṃ trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 8 ||
895:24: tvāṃ vinā na gatiryasya trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 9 ||
895:28: devīṃ sampūjya yatnena labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam || 11 ||
895:29: aṣṭamyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ navamyāṃ yaḥ paṭhennaraḥ |
895:31: mokṣārthī labhate mokṣaṃ dhanārthī labhate dhanam |
895:33: idaṃ stotraṃ paṭhitvā tu saṃgrāme praviśennaraḥ |
895:34: tasya śatruḥ kṣayaṃ yāti sadā prajñā prajāyate || 14 ||
895:36: ya idaṃ paṭhate stotraṃ śubhaṃ tasya na saṃśayaḥ || 15 ||
